item.title: Timers
item.dc:creator: @ravekitty ravekitty
item.description:
@ravekitty wrote:

How would I apply a delayed message timer on this



package teste;


/**
 * @author Kyle
 *
 */
public class Client {
	
	private static String Question [] ={"Do you like ","Do you enjoy ","I heard you liek "};
	private static String Question2 [] ={"Mudkipz","White people","pussy cats","Black people","Gang signs"};
	private static String Questionset [] ={"How old","How many","How often"};
	private static int Questions = 1;
	public static String rQuestion() {
		return Question[(int) (Math.random() * Question.length)];
	}
	
	public static String rQuestion2() {
		return Question2[(int) (Math.random() * Question2.length)];
	}
	
	public static String rQuestionset() {
		return Questionset[(int) (Math.random() * Questionset.length)];
	}
	
	public static void AskQuestion() {
		while(Questions >0 ) {
		System.out.println(""+ rQuestion() +"" + rQuestion2() + "?");
		}
	}	
}
